title: Verify Ralph v1.5 integration - live updates, MCP registry, /update skill
description: End-to-end verification that all v1.5 features work together: live criteria updates, per-project notifications, MCP registry, /update skill, and skill structure compliance.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Run Ralph on ralphtools - verify live criteria bar updates during iteration
Run ralph-status in separate terminal - verify criteria checkboxes update
Verify per-project ntfy topics work (run Ralph on two projects, get separate notifications)
Test /update skill: add story while Ralph running → goes to update.json
Test /update skill: add story while Ralph NOT running → goes to index.json
Verify MCP registry loads project-specific MCPs (if US-055-057 complete)
Verify all skills in ~/.claude/commands/ follow correct structure
